request.authError: Sorry, you need to log in..

description.intro:
You are registering your Public Keys and vault addresses.

Your Airdrop Share is based on how long you have kept funds in Vultisig for.

Only Layer1 assets and tokens on the 1inch Tocken List apply.

You must have at least $50 in your wallet. This is necessary to exclude bots.

No other information is collected.

qa.q: How do I register for the airdrop?
qa.a:
Become a Vultisig wallet user.

Note: Airdrop is based on your total vault amounts, multiplied by the length of time your funds are kept in the vault. The largest holders for the longest amount of time earn the most

qa.q: What assets are counted for the Airdrop?
qa.a: Any supported Layer1 or Layer2 asset, and any token on the 1inch token list

The first Airdrop period goes for 12 months - it is 10% of the Supply of $VULT.

Then there is an annual airdrop of 2% of the supply for 5 years. A total of 20% will be airdropped.

empty.title: Wallet not connected
empty.description: Do not connect a wallet if you do not wish for your public keys to be sent to the Airdrop Registry

empty.title: Nobody here.
empty.description: The quantity of airdrop received is influenced by the number of friends who are invited

error.title: Something is wrong
descriptions: Sorry, but the app you're looking for is currently experiencing some technical difficulties

access-denied.title: Access by invitation only
descriptions: Please note that in order to log in, a referral code is required. You can find this code by searching for #vultiref on various social networks.
